p: Hasheminya et al. [ 47] had prepared the Kefiran-CMC films containing copper oxide nanoparticles (CuONPs). Firstly, the kefiran solution and CMC solution in distilled water were prepared, respectively. These two solutions were mixed and glycerol was added. Then, the stirring was conducted another 15 min. Subsequently, CuONPs were added to the kefiran-CMC solution and conducted sonication. Finally, the obtained solution was poured into glass plates and dried at 25 Â°C for 72 h.
